sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.neighborhood_code: Assessor neighborhood code, first two digits are township, last three are neighborhood
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.is_mydec_date: Indicates whether the sale date has been overwritten with a more precise value from IDOR (Illinois Department of Revenue). In the past the Assessor's ingest process truncated sale dates to the first of the month. Not all sales can be updated with dates from IDOR.
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.sale_document_num: Sale document number. Corresponds to Clerk's document number
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.mydec_deed_type: Deed type from MyDec, more granular than CCAO deed type
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.is_multisale: Indicates whether a parcel was sold individually or as part of a larger group of PINs
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.num_parcels_sale: The number of parcels that were part of the sale
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.sale_filter_same_sale_within_365: Remove sale with the same value (for the same PIN) within 365 days
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.sale_filter_less_than_10k: Indicator for whether sale is less than $10K FMW
sample_01_Assessor_-_Parcel_Sales_2023_2.sale_filter_deed_type: Indicator for quit claim, executor, beneficiary and missing deed types

sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.neighborhood_code: Assessor neighborhood code, first two digits are township, last three are neighborhood
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.mailed_hie: Assessor mailed home improvement exemption value
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.certified_hie: Assessor certified home improvement exemption value
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.board_bldg: Board of Review certified building value
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.board_land: Board of Review certified land value
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.board_tot: Board of Review certified total value
sample_03_Assessor_-_Assessed_Values_202.board_hie: Board of Review certified home improvement exemption value

sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.card_num: Card number. Each card is an improvement/building on the parcel
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.proration_key_pin: Tieback key PIN. Prorated properties (whose value is split across multiple PINs) have a 'main' or key PIN
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.pin_proration_rate: Tieback proration rate. Prorated properties (whose value is split across multiple PINs) pay taxes on the proportion of value on their PIN. In other words, assessed value is multiplied by proration rate to determine taxable assessed value
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.card_proration_rate: Card proration rate. Prorated parcels (whose value is split across multiple cards) pay taxes on the proportion of value on their card. In other words, assessed value is multiplied by proration rate to determine taxable assessed value. Cards are divisions within parcels, such as one of multiple buildings on a single parcel.
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.cdu: Condition, Desirability, and Utility code. Not well maintained.
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.pin_is_multicard: Multicard PIN. Indicates whether the parcel contains more than one building (ADU, coach house, etc.)
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.pin_num_cards: Number of cards on this parcel. Each card is an improvement/building
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.pin_is_multiland: Multiland PIN. Indicates whether parcel has more than one landline
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.pin_num_landlines: Number of landlines on a parcel. The sum of all landline square footage should be equal to the total square footage of the parcel. Each landline can correspond to a different land price/rate
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.building_sqft: Building square feet. Square footage of the building, as measured from the exterior
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.land_sqft: Land square feet. Square footage of the land (not just the building) of the property. Note that a single PIN can have multiple landlines, meaning it can be associated with more than one land price/rate
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_rooms: Rooms. Number of total rooms in the building (excluding baths). Not to be confused with bedrooms
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_full_baths: Full baths. Defined as having a bath or shower. If this value is missing, the default value is set to 1
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_half_baths: Half baths. Defined as bathrooms without a shower or bathtub
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_fireplaces: Fireplaces. Counted as the number of flues one can see from the outside of the building
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_apartments: Apartments. Number of apartments for class 211 and 212 properties
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.garage_area_included: Is Garage 1 physically included within the building area? If yes, the garage area is subtracted from the building square feet calculation by the field agent
sample_04_Assessor_-_Single_and_Multi-Fa.num_commercial_units: Number of commercial units on the parcel (the vast majority are for properties with class 212)
